tokens.text: validates resource pack dependencies in manifests

title: Resource Pack Deps
description: Validates that resource pack dependencies declared in behavior pack manifests are properly resolved and available.

fields.title: Invalid Manifest JSON
fields.description: Error when a pack manifest contains invalid JSON syntax. Check for missing commas, brackets, or malformed entries.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the invalid manifest file

fields.title: Missing Resource Pack
fields.description: Error when a behavior pack declares a dependency on a resource pack that cannot be found. Ensure the resource pack is included and the UUID matches.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the UUID of the missing resource pack dependency

fields.title: Processing Error
fields.description: An internal error occurred while processing resource pack dependencies. Check logs for details.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains details about the internal processing error
